title: Mistletoe Kisses
description: Hannah left her home, family and friends in County Tyrone, Northern Ireland at the age 25. She not only wanted to find herself but wanted to be true to herself. She builds a life for herself in New York and has everything that she could ever want. The only thing missing from her life is a lover. She makes a trip home for the first time in twenty years to celebrate Christmas. What kind of welcome will she get? Meeting Allison, her younger sisterâ€™s best friend the sparks fly between them but Hannah is hesitating because of the age gap between them. Can she allow herself to follow her heart and fall for the younger woman? Could she find her once in a lifetime love?
author: Charlie Conwell
